message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $165.
Alice, $165 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really looking to stay within my budget. How about $140? That would be a good compromise for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money. I can offer it to you for $155.
